channel.title: Testconf2017 on Блог отчаянной QA домохозяйки
channel.description: Recent content in Testconf2017 on Блог отчаянной QA домохозяйки

item.title: Rubber cluster for dynamic selenium grid
item.description: Many of us have experienced such situations when projects involve +100500 automated tests and all these projects are subject to review more often than once in two weeks. And in the meantime, you don’t have an adequate amount of physical and monetary resources to build up a powerful farm. Fast delivery of value to the customer will be out of the question if regression testing of each modification takes the entire sprint!
